pull.title: util: Don't set strMiscWarning on every exception
pull.body:
Fixes #6809 - run-of-the-mill exceptions should not get into strMiscWarning (which is reported by `getinfo`).

Edit: after this we could move `strMiscWarning` out of util, as it's not used there anymore. But it's not clear to where.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message:
util: Don't set strMiscWarning on every exception

Fixes #6809 - run-of-the-mill exceptions should not get into
strMiscWarning (which is reported by `getinfo`).

issue.title: [v0.10.0] EXCEPTION: St12out_of_range CInv::GetCommand() : type=-1929379840 unknown type bitcoin in ProcessMessages()
issue.body:
- OS: Linux 3.13.0-32-generic
- Bitcoind: 0.10.0

```
bitcoin-cli getinfo
{
    "version" : 100000,
    "protocolversion" : 70002,
    "blocks" : 345763,
    "timeoffset" : -1,
    "connections" : 253,
    "proxy" : "",
    "difficulty" : 46684376316.86029053,
    "testnet" : false,
    "relayfee" : 0.00010000,
    "errors" : "EXCEPTION: St12out_of_range       \nCInv::GetCommand() : type=-1929379840 unknown type       \nbitcoin in ProcessMessages()       \n"
}
```

issue.title: Util ports
issue.body:
Misc PRs from Core related to util.cpp/util.h

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6164 - Allow user to use -debug=1 to enable all debugging
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6361 - Use real number of cores for default -par, ignore virtual cores
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6149 - Buffer log messages and explicitly open logs
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6438 - openssl: avoid config file load/race
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6284 - Fix argument parsing oddity with -noX
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6742 - Changed logging to make -logtimestamps to work also for -printtoconsole
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7114 - util: Don't set strMiscWarning on every exception
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7667 - Move GetTempPath() to testutil
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8000 - tinyformat: force USE_VARIADIC_TEMPLATES
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8011 - don't run ThreadMessageHandler at lowered priority
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8123 - Use std::atomic for fRequestShutdown and fReopenDebugLog

issue.title: Upstream PRs relating to strMiscWarning
issue.body:
This pulls in upstream PRs bitcoin/bitcoin#7114 and bitcoin/bitcoin#9236 (non-QT parts).

* Fixes bitcoin/bitcoin#6809 - run-of-the-mill exceptions should not get into `strMiscWarning` (which is reported by `getinfo`).
* Eliminate data races for `strMiscWarning` and `fLargeWork*Found`. This moves all access to these data structures through accessor functions and protects them with a lock.

labels.name: C-upstream-port
labels.description: Category: Changes that are ported from the Bitcoin Core codebase.
